title: THIS WEEK IN FAKE NEWS: Matt Damon DID NOT say Duterte’s the ‘last man standing’ in drug war
subtitle: While the story was posted under “Humor and Satire,” several Facebook followers praised Damon for “supporting” Duterte.
author: www.verafiles.org
vclaim:
This fake report trended on social media this week. Don’t believe it.

Using various online tools, VERA Files tracks FAKE NEWS that have trended online this week. We read fake news, so you don’t have to.

(Guided by the code of principles of the International Fact-Checking Network at Poynter, VERA Files tracks the false claims, flip-flops, misleading statements of public officials and figures, and debunks them with factual evidence. Find out more about this initiative.)
